import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Car, MapPin, Phone, Mail, CheckCircle, MessageCircle, Calendar, ChevronDown, Clock, Award, Shield, Star, Users, Map, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react'; const ShafeerPortfolio = () => { const [bookingDetails, setBookingDetails] = useState({ service: '', bookingDate: '', carType: '', pickupLocation: '', dropoffLocation: '', phoneNumber: '', email: '' }); const cars = [ { name: 'Toyota Previa', image: '/api/placeholder/500/300', // This will be replaced with your local image capacity: '7 Passengers', features: ['Comfortable Seating', 'Air Conditioning', 'Smooth Ride'] }, { name: 'Kia Carnival', image: '/api/placeholder/500/300', // This will be replaced with your local image capacity: '8 Passengers', features: ['Spacious Interior', 'Premium Comfort', 'Modern Amenities'] } ]; const services = [ { type: 'Full Day Service - 800 AED', icon: , description: 'Luxury chauffeur service with discretion and premium comfort.', price: '800 AED', duration: 'Full Day' }, { type: 'Half Day Service - 400 AED', icon: , description: 'Reliable transportation with punctuality guaranteed.', price: '400 AED', duration: 'Half Day' }, { type: 'Drop-off Service - 150 AED', icon: , description: 'One-way transportation with professional chauffeur.', price: '150 AED', duration: 'Single Trip' } ]; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Booking submitted:', bookingDetails); }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setBookingDetails(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; return (

); }; export default ShafeerPortfolio;
